metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6414 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Memory leak in the vcard_apdu_new function in card_7816.c in libcacard before 2.5.3 allows local guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host memory consumption) via vectors related to allocating a new APDU object.

criterions.comment: libcacard package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.0-3').
